title: TCL Deleted the Camera Bump - 20 Pro 5G Smartphone
description: Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping @Manscaped at    TCL is getting into the smartphone game, and they're releasing mid-tier phones. It's a fairly smart move, and they managed to not have a camera bump! What do you guys think?
